Off The Track: Fire at new Havelock North site extinguished before major damage https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/off-the-track-fire-at-new-havelock-north-site-fused-before-major-damage/6MICC4AQOJB5HPL33DAZ2SGCWU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/off-the-track-fire-at-new-havelock-north-site-fused-before-major-damage/6MICC4AQOJB5HPL33DAZ2SGCWU/ James PocockThe cause is understood to be similar to the fire that destroyed the restaurant last year. Photo / File
